insert into t_character_across (f_character_id, f_across_server_id, f_shouyi_state, f_shouyi_lingqu_time, f_kuafu_date, f_account_id, f_character_initially_id, f_account_initially_id, f_server_id) values (#characterId:INTEGER#, #acrossServerId:INTEGER#, #shouyiState:INTEGER#, #shouyiLingquTime:TIMESTAMP#, #kuafuDate:TIMESTAMP#, #accountId:INTEGER#, #characterInitiallyId:INTEGER#, #accountInitiallyId:INTEGER#, #serverId:INTEGER#)

sqlMap.update:
update t_character_across
f_character_id = #characterId:INTEGER#
f_across_server_id = #acrossServerId:INTEGER#
f_shouyi_state = #shouyiState:INTEGER#
f_shouyi_lingqu_time = #shouyiLingquTime:TIMESTAMP#
f_kuafu_date = #kuafuDate:TIMESTAMP#

f_server_id = #serverId:INTEGER#
where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
